channel.title: MITB Recent Posts[cURL/preg]
channel.description:
Basically I just grabbed the last post section and title from the front page of the forum.
http://noob.servebeer.com/google.php
The last script I posted no one seemed to care, so if I get some replies I'll post the source.

item.title: MITB Recent Posts[cURL/preg]
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

The RSS feed for SMF works for all sections, all forums, all topics, all posts (except those hidden). Not like you can’t filter, and it is outputted as XML for a reason (for an application to parse easily).

Read full topic

item.title: MITB Recent Posts[cURL/preg]
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:3, topic:241895”]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?type=rss;action=.xml

RSS is much cleaner, and easier. Plus, it exists for a reason…[/quote]

yessir it does, but my intentions with this are for any section of any page, I believe rss is set up for a very limited view of a certain section of the site. Plus the fact that this could be implemented with any style or graphics wanted.

Read full topic
